news_header: Metsä Group's comparable operating result decreased to EUR 33 million in Q4 from EUR 57 million the previous year.
news_original_title: Metsä Groupin tulos heikkeni selvästi loka-joulukuussa
news_text: Metsä Group's comparable operating result for October-December fell to EUR 33 million from EUR 57 million last year. Turnover was just under EUR 1.5 billion. For the entire last year, the Forest Group's comparable operating result dropped to EUR 203 million from EUR 488 million the previous year, with net sales decreasing to EUR 5.7 billion from EUR 6.1 billion. Director-General Ilkka Hämälä noted low demand in the main market across most product groups, except for soft and food-making papers and laminated wood.
